title: Returns relating to publications in the Bengali language, in 1857, to which is added, a list of the native presses, with the books printed at each, their price and character, with a notice of the past condition and future prospects of the vernacular press of Bengal, and the statistics of the Bombay and Madras vernacular presses
creator: Long, James
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Long, James: Returns relating to publications in the Bengali language, in 1857, to which is added, a list of the native presses, with the books printed at each, their price and character, with a notice of the past condition and future prospects of the vernacular press of Bengal, and the statistics of the Bombay and Madras vernacular presses.
